titleStmt.title: The description of a voyage made by certaine ships of Holland into the East Indies VVith their aduentures and successe: together with the description of the countries, townes, and inhabitantes of the same: who set forth on the second of Aprill 1595. and returned on the 14. of August. 1597. Translated out of Dutch into English by W.P.
Verhael vande reyse by de Hollandtsche schepen gedaen naer Oost Indien. English.
titleStmt.author: Phillip, William.
Houtman, Cornelis de, d. 1599, attributed name.
Langenes, Barent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by [John Windet? for] Iohn Wolfe,

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to Cornelius de Houtman, who was commander of the voyage.
A translation of: Verhael vande reyse by de Hollandtsche schepen gedaen naer Oost Indiennez.
Foreword signed by the publisher of the Dutch edition: Bernardt Langhenez.
Actual printer's name conjectured by STC.
Running title reads: The foure Hollanders ships voyage.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
